item.title: Explaining Ontologies to Your Boss
item.description: If you are a developer, software architect, or have worked in any data-focused organisation, you might have come across ontologies before. You may have heard about companies or research institutions who have leveraged ontologies to pull their data into a new age of “machine-readability”. If so, you could have tried to explain the benefits of this technology with your boss, only to be met with a blank face.
